job.title: Unity Software Engineer
job.description:
Unity Software Engineer – Perm – Remote


The end client is unable to sponsor or transfer visas for this position; all parties authorized to work in the US without sponsorship are encouraged to apply.


Our Client is seeking a Unity Software Engineer.


Role Description


• Building and debugging frameworks, tools, and applications.

• Tracking and reporting on project status.

• Interfacing closely with various teams including quality assurance, server developers, machine learning engineers, and business managers to translate requirements and constraints into native software.

• Working with the team to identify and implement data-driven improvements to systems and processes.

• Clearly communicating with the team progress made, define deliverables, and help set timelines.

• Working on code remediation and improving application performance.

• Collaboration with team members (Quality Assurance, Development, Operations) to determine possible solutions for any problems or issues


Skills & Requirements


• 6+ years of experience shipping production-grade C# and Unity applications.

• Hands-on experience with mixed reality, AR & VR development.

• Understanding of how to keep app performance and user experience a top priority.

• Familiarity and a general understanding of front-end/back-end web development, cloud platforms, and web stack development is a plus.

• Self-starter with a mindset of continuous improvement and growth.

• Experience with team application development, CI/CD, and VCS systems like GitHub.

• Comfort with incremental code testing and deployment.

• Strong communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced small team environment.

• Education: BS/BE in CS or equivalent.
